reviews.review_msg: really bad teacher, he doesn't explain what he wants or mark fairly by any means. I would not recommend taking a class with him.
Refuses to use a mic, reads of her own version of sparknotes, no notes
Best professor I have ever had the pleasure of having in my University career.

What an amazing prof! Tough grader: yes,  great feedback: also yes. Dr. Everton has officially destroyed all other english courses for me. I LOVED his poetry class, and as long as you basically memorize details about the poems (he will tell you the ones to note) the final exam is a cake walk. Got 95 on the final and 91 in the course.

I was not into poetry but his lectures were so inspirational that I actually enjoyed the course a lot. You must attend lecture to pass. There is not much to read like other english courses. He is amazing.

Dr. Everton was very energetic, excited about lecture, and hilarious. The content in the class is super easy to understand, the work load was not too much just 4 papers (1 was minor) and made poetry bearable! Overall he is a great prof, would take this class again and the marking was not tough.  Awesome Prof!!! would strongly recommend!

Such a great professor, as my first professor ever in post secondary, he has done an amazing job of making my first year memorable. He is so passionate in what he does and always repeats the most important things you need to know. Also, his voice is very clear, with his charming Virginia roots he is hilarious and I loved the course in general!
He was a great professor, he didn't add a lot of notes to his lecture slides so it was important to attend lectures but by far one of my favourite professors.
